Gear.Name: Metronome [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
After the holder makes a Move check add 1 base damage to the Move that was used and removes the bonus gratnted by this item to all the holders other Moves

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Mirror Herb [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
Once per battle the holder can copy a stat increase used by an opponent

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Protective Pads [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
Holder does not trigger effects that require an enemy to attack in engaged range

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Punching Gloves [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
Moves the holder uses with Punch in the name have their base damage increased by 1

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Quick Claw [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
Once per battle the holder can add the Quickness Property to a Move

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Razor Fang [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
Add Flinch Property to all the holders Moves

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Red Card [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
Once per battle when the holder suffers wounds from an enemy that enemy must be swapped out if possible

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Ring target [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
Holder looses any immunities

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Rocky Helmet [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
When holder recives wounds from a Move with Range of engaged the user also suffers 1 wound

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Room Service [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
When the holder is subject to Trick Room Slow 1 befor the effect of Trick Room

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Safety Goggles [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
Holder does not take damage from Sandstorm and Is immune to Properties of Spore and Powder Moves

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Shed Shell [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
Holder is immune to Properties activated by swapping

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Shell Bell [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
When the holder inflicts wounds they heal 2 wounds

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Sticky Barb [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
Holder suffers 1 wound at the end of each round. Is the holder is hit by a Move with range of engaged sticky barb is taken from the holder.

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Throat Spray [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
Once per battle when the holder uses a Move with the volcal Property Wax 1

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Utility Unbrella [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
Holder is immune to Rain, Heavy Rain, Harsh Sunlight, and Extremly Harsh Sunlight

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Wide Lens [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
Holders Moves gain Accurate 1 if they already have Accurate increase its rank by 1

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Zoom Lens [Held Item]
Gear.Description:
If the target of the Holders Move check has already gone this round the Move gains Accurate 2 if they already have Accurate increase its rank by 2

[Held Item]

Gear.Name: Adaptability [Ability]
Gear.Description:
STAB Moves gain an additional advantage

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Aerilate [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Normal Type moves used within short range become Flying Type instead

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Aftermath [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you feint if it was caused by a Move with range of engaged the user suffers 4 wounds

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Air Lock [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Battlefield Effects are negated

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Analytic [Ability]
Gear.Description:
If you are last to take a turn in the round increase your Moves base damage by 2

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Anger Point [Ability]
Gear.Description:
If a triumph or despair is used against you Hone 6

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Anger Shell [Ability]
Gear.Description:
While your wounds are above half your wound threshold gain Hone 1, Wax 1, Haste 1, Erode 1, Discourage 1

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Anticipation [Ability]
Gear.Description:
You know if an enemy has a Move that you are weak to

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Arena Trap [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Grounded enemies engaged with you gain Trapped condition

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Armor Tail [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you are targeted by a Move with the Quickness Property the Move fails without a roll.

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Aroma Veil [Ability]
Gear.Description:
You are immune to the following conditions when they are caused by enemies: Locked In, Locked Out, Incurable. And the Infatuated Status Effect.

[Ability]

Gear.Name: As One [Ability]
Gear.Description:
You die

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Aura Break [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Enemies within medium range with either Fairy Aura or Dark Aura loose the effects of those abilities and also their fairy or fdark type moves have their base damage lowerd by 2

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Bad Dreams [Ability]
Gear.Description:
At the end of each round enemies engaged with you that are asleep suffer 2 wounds

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Ball Fetch [Ability]
Gear.Description:
If you are the active Poke your trainer does not lose their balls on failed capture attempts

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Battery [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Allies in melee range gain Wax 1

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Battle Armor [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Triumphs and Despairs rolled by others cannot be used against you

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Battle Bond [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Once per battle if you cause another Poke to feint gain Hone 1, Wax 1, Haste 1

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Beads of Ruin [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Other Pokes within medium range suffer Discourage 1

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Beast Boost [Ability]
Gear.Description:
The first time each battle you cause a Poke to feint choose either Hone 1, Wax 1, Haste 1, Encourage 1, or Fortify 1 and gain that effect. Each time you cause another Poke to feint gain the chosen effect again.

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Berserk [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Each time you wounds increase past half your wound threshold gain Wax 1

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Big Pecks [Ability]
Gear.Description:
You are immune to Erode property from other Pokes

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Blaze [Ability]
Gear.Description:
While your wounds are above half your wound threshold the base damage of Fire Type Moves is 2 higher

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Bulletproof [Ability]
Gear.Description:
You are immune to Moves is the Projectile Property

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Cheek Pouch [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Heal 5 wounds when you consume a berry

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Chilling Neigh [Ability]
Gear.Description:
If you cause another Poke to feint gain Hone 1

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Chlorophyll [Ability]
Gear.Description:
In Harsh Sunlight or Extremely Harsh Sunlight gain Haste 2

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Clear Body [Ability]
Gear.Description:
You are immune to Dull, Wane, Slow, Erode, and Discourage caused by other Pokes

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Cloud Nine [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you enter the battlefield Weather becomes Calm Skys

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Color Change [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you suffer wounds from a Move used by another Poke your Type changes to match that Move.

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Comatose [Ability]
Gear.Description:
You have permanant Sleep Status Effect. All your Moves gain the Sleepwalk Property

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Commander [Ability]
Gear.Description:
You die

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Competitive [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you suffer from Dull, Wane, Slow, Erode, or Discourage caused by other Pokes gain Wax 2

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Compound Eyes [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Your Moves gain Accurate 3 if they already have Accurate increase the rank by 3

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Contrary [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Hone, Wax, Haste, Encourage, Fortify, Dull, Wane, Slow, Erode, and Discourage used on you do the opposite of what they normally do

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Corrosion [Ability]
Gear.Description:
You can Give the Poison Status Effect to Pokes that are immune to Poison

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Costar [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you enter the battlefiled Copy the Stat bonuses and negitives of one ally

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Cotton Down [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you suffer wounds from another Poke's Move all other Pokes in Medium range suffer Slow 1

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Cud Chew [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you use a berry you gain the effects again at the end of your next turn

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Curious Medicine [Ability]
Gear.Description:
All allies Stats are reset to normal

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Cursed body [Ability]
Gear.Description:
You may use 2 disadvantages on Moves used against you to give the Move Locked-out 4

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Cute Charm [Ability]
Gear.Description:
You may use 2 disadvantages on Moves used against you within short range to give the use Infatuated as long as it is the opposite gender

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Damp [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Pokes within medium long cannot gain the benifits of the Aftermath Ability. And If they use Self-Destruct, Explosion, Mind Blown, or Misty Explosion they fail without a check.

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Dancer [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When another Poke within Medium range uses a Move with the Dancing Property you may immediatly use that move as well as an out of turn incedental.

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Dark Aura [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Base damge of Dark Type Moves used within medium range of you is increased by 2.

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Dauntless Shield [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Once per battle when you enter the battlefield Fortify 1

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Dazzling [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you are targeted by a Move with the Quickness Property the Move fails without a roll.

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Defeatist [Ability]
Gear.Description:
While you wounds are equal to or greater than holf you wound threshhold suffer Dull 2 and Wane 2

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Defiant [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you suffer from Dull, Wane, Slow, Erode, or Discourage caused by other Pokes gain Hone 2

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Delta Stream [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you enter the battlefield Weather becomes Strong Winds

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Desolate Land [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you enter the battlefield Weather becomes Extremly Harsh Sunlight

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Disguise [Ability]
Gear.Description:
The first time you would suffer wounds each battle you instead do not. Excluding battlefield effects.

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Download [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Once per battle when you enter the battle field choose gain either Hone 1 or Wax 1

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Dragon's Maw [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Increase the base damage of Dragon Type Moves by 2

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Drizzle [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you enter the battlefield Weather becomes Rain

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Drought [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you enter the battlefield Weather becomes Harsh Sunlight

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Dry Skin [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When you would suffer wounds from a Fire Type Move you suffer 2 additional. If a water Type Move is sucessfully used against you you suffer no wounds and instead heal 4 wounds. In Harsh sunlight and Extremely Harsh Sunlight you suffer 2 wounds at the end of each round. In Rain and Heavy Rain you heal 2 wounds at the end of each round.

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Early Bird [Ability]
Gear.Description:
When making a Status Effect check to recover from sleep downgrade the difficulty of the check twice and if you succeed remove the condition and take your turn as if you did not have it at the start of your turn.

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Earth Eater [Ability]
Gear.Description:
If a Ground Type Move is sucessfully used against you you suffer no wounds and instead heal 4 wounds.

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Effect Spore [Ability]
Gear.Description:
Your engaged range Moves gain the Poison, Paralyze, and Sleep Properties

[Ability]

Gear.Name: Electric Surge [Ability]
Gear.Description:

You are immune to the Sleep Status Effect

You Die
